symbols.symbolsPath: An optional path to a separate symbols json file. If found, that file is preferred, and these options are ignored.
symbols.imagePath: An optional path to a symbols file containing every symbol from this set.

symbolName.imagePath: An optional path to a file containing just this symbol.

location.x: The x location within the imagePath. Defaults to 0.
location.y: The y location within the imagePath. Defaults to 0.
location.width: The width of the image within the imagePath. Defaults to 0.
location.height: The height of the image within the imagePath. Defaults to 0.

_synonyms.synonym1: A symbolName that synonym1 should resolve to.
_synonyms.synonym2: A symbolName that synonym2 should resolve to.

fonts.fontsPath: An optional path to a separate fonts json file. If found, that file is preferred, and these options are ignored.

cardFormat.path: The path to the image. This will be drawn on every card.

location.x: The x location of the image. Defaults to 0.
location.y: The y location of the image. Defaults to 0.
location.width: The width of the image. Defaults to 0.
location.height: The height of the image. Defaults to 0.

cardFormat.content: The text to write. This will be written on every card.

location.x: The x location of the text. Defaults to 0.
location.y: The y location of the text. Defaults to 0.
location.width: The width of the text. Defaults to 0.
location.height: The height of the text. Defaults to 0.

cardFormat.property: The property to read from the card definition.

location.x: The x location of the image. Defaults to 0.
location.y: The y location of the image. Defaults to 0.
location.width: The width of the image. Defaults to 0.
location.height: The height of the image. Defaults to 0.

cardFormat.property: The property to read from the card definition.

location.x: The x location of the text. Defaults to 0.
location.y: The y location of the text. Defaults to 0.
location.width: The width of the text. Defaults to 0.
location.height: The height of the text. Defaults to 0.
